channel.title: Mironics Maze releases. ((!)new maze: TOHC)
channel.description:
[s]Update: map 2... forgot to install a redstone piece XD so... hold on. [/s] [s]Update: map 2 is uploading...[/s] Update: all is good to go. maze 1 Easy puzzle, Cobble Palace [code] an easy puzzlemap i made... one part does not work... so i left the wireing open for you to edit... if you can fix it...
Good luck.
also you may look at the wiring of the piston doors.
http://up.ht/mTZ9T4
THE ENTRANCE http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/151/20110702154844.png/ Where you start http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/52/20110702154900.png/ a sign http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/694/20110702154928.png/ more signs. http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/231/20110702154951.png/ another sign http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/148/20110702155016.png/ The real challenge area http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/194/20110702155030.png/ Luck out. http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/232/20110702155322.png/ Adventure through the nether (last challenge) http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/8/20110702155352.png/[/code]
Medium puzzle, The temple of hell city. (has somewhat of a storyline.) [code] Entrance http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/17/20110703024450.png/
First challenge http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/41/20110703024502.png/
Second challenge http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/842/20110703024549.png/
weeeeee http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/228/20110703024607.png/
pew pew pew... third challenge http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/687/20110703024642.png/
Screenshots do not show the full maze. that would be cheating
Download: http://up.ht/keuU0N have fun. [/code]
HARD map, Internal Sorrows: [code]W.i.P Size: Huge rooms: 120 Hidden diamonds: around 450 Redstone code: All. you will even have to use every type of generator. entrance: which one? how many entrances are there?: 4. four different Buildings. Minecart rides: 15/120 rooms will need minecarts] [/code] Progress of large map:[xxoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo] 6%
edit: i added pictures, also... the hard part is easy... becuase the dispensers wont fire... i left it open for you to fix XD if you want.
USEFULL TIPS
Dont miss a single sign.
